approaches.title: If Else
approaches.blurb: Use booleans to find the correct translation for each digit.

approaches.title: Loop Over Romans
approaches.blurb: Test Roman Numerals from the largest down and eat the maximum possible at each step.

approaches.title: Table Lookup
approaches.blurb: Use a 2-D lookup table to eliminate loop nesting.

approaches.title: Itertools Starmap
approaches.blurb: Use itertools.starmap() for an ingenious functional approach.

approaches.title: Recurse Match
approaches.blurb: Combine recursive programming with the recently-introduced structural pattern matching.
